name: Strawberry Shortcake
description:
The game is a short but sweet history about being stood up by a date and finding someone with who you can talk for a while. The art was made by IamWierd who you can find on instagram and twitter(they have commissions open), the music was made by paloma palomin and the writing and coding(personally I think it's and insult to programming to call tyranobuilder coding) was made by me,Zejbo32.

It was made for the "strawberry to the heart " jam and features a strawberry shortcake

TW : The main character is implied to have some form of anxiety 

Non serious tw:  Mormon slander, letterboxd and film major slander and a lot of really bad jokes
